sentences.english: Leiomyosarcoma of the small intestine is an uncommon tumor.
sentences.chinese: 小腸平滑肌肉瘤是一種罕見的腫瘤。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the clinical effect of intestinal intubation plication(IIP).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討小腸內置管排列術的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: This is another example of Crohn's disease involving the small intestine .
sentences.chinese: 這是另一例發生在小腸的克隆病。

sentences.english: Risk factors for small bowel bacterial overgrowth in cystic fibrosis.
sentences.chinese: 膽囊纖維化患者小腸菌羣過度生長的風險因素。

sentences.english: Condoms made out of animal intestines began to be available.
sentences.chinese: 由動物小腸製造的避孕套開始被使用。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the value of CT diagnosing intraluminal masses of small intestine.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討小腸腔內腫塊性病變的CT診斷價值。

sentences.english: Conclusions Primary small bowel tumor is uncommon and easy to be misdiagnosed.
sentences.chinese: 結論原發性小腸腫瘤少見，容易誤診。

sentences.english: Intestinal RNA decreased the intestinal bacterial metathetic rate.
sentences.chinese: 小腸RNA可降低受照射小鼠腸道細菌移位率。

sentences.english: These drugs are usually a orbed from sites in the small intestine.
sentences.chinese: 他們通常經小腸特殊部位被吸收。

sentences.english: Villi in the small intestine increase the surface area of the gut, which helps in the absorption of food.
sentences.chinese: 小腸絨毛增加了小腸的表面積，有助於營養吸收。

sentences.english: Bloating or swelling of the lower abdomen may be present in many intestinal (bowel) conditions including irritable bowel syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 下腹部的脹氣可能是由於腸道疾病包括小腸綜合徵。

sentences.english: Ischemia-reperfulion injury model of small bowel transplantation was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立小腸移植缺血再灌注損傷模型。

sentences.english: Study on small intestinal absorption of tegafur new proliposome in rat;
sentences.chinese: 目的研究格列美脲的小腸吸收方式。

sentences.english: Securely seals the ileocecal valve, between the colon and the small intestine.
sentences.chinese: 很安全地封住了小腸和結腸之間的迴盲瓣。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the regulatory effects of bombesin on the activities of disaccharidase in the intestinal mucosal cells in neonatal rabbits.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鈴蟾肽對新生兔小腸黏膜雙糖酶活性的影響。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the intestinal absorption and liver distribution characters of pravastatin in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究普伐他汀在大鼠小腸吸收及肝臟分佈特徵。

definition: rarity/rare delicacy/foreign matter/alien body/the dead/ghost/monstrosity/alien life-form
to wiggle/to squirm/peristalsis (wave movement of gut wall)
